Dumbbell Rowing Machine: A rowing machine with dumbbells attached to the arms to provide resistance and increase the challenge for the user.
Dumbbell Chest Press: A machine that allows the user to press dumbbells upwards to target the chest muscles.
Dumbbell Bicep Curl: A machine that allows the user to curl dumbbells upwards to target the bicep muscles.
Dumbbell Tricep Extension: A machine that allows the user to extend dumbbells downwards to target the tricep muscles.
Dumbbell Shoulder Press: A machine that allows the user to press dumbbells upwards to target the shoulder muscles.
